message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000. This is a competitive price considering its worth to you is $8,000.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  While I appreciate your product, $12,000 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $8,500.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement.

Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand that $12,000 might be a stretch for you, but I still think my product is worth a premium. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $11,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you is $8,000.

Hi Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $11,000 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to pay $9,500.  This would be a fair price for both of us, as it's closer to my value and you'd still get a good profit.

Hi Bob, I understand that $11,000 might be a bit too high, but I'm not willing to give up too much profit. I'm willing to compromise and sell it to you for $10,800. This is still a good deal for me, considering the value it holds for you.

Hi Alice, I understand your need to make a profit, but $10,800 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $9,800.  This is a fair price for both of us, as it's closer to my value and you'd still get a good profit.

Hi Bob, I understand that $10,800 might be a bit too high, but I'm not willing to give up too much profit. I'm willing to compromise and sell it to you for $10,500. This is still a good deal for me, considering the value it holds for you.

Hi Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $10,500 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to pay $9,900.  This is a fair price for both of us, as it's closer to my value and you'd still get a good profit.  Let's finalize this deal.

Hi Bob, I understand that $10,500 might be a bit too high, but I'm not willing to give up too much profit. I'm willing to compromise and sell it to you for $10,200. This is still a good deal for me, considering the value it holds for you.
